level.heading: Notice requirement.
level.text: Within 30 days of the effective date of this subchapter [April 4, 2003], the Mayor shall issue an administrative order advising all District agency heads, deputy agency heads, chief financial officers, agency budget directors, agency controllers, and other managers of the requirement of this subchapter.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 15-105 validated a previously made technical correction.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-285
level.text: For Law 14-285, see notes following ยง 47-355.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-105
level.text: For Law 15-105, see notes following ยง 47-340.22.
